title: Emotion-Based Multimedia Learning Design Workshop

context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course focusing on digital environments that induce learners' emotional engagement

learning_goals: Learners can design multimedia materials using pedagogical agents that elicit positive emotional responses
Learners can analyze and explain complex social phenomena by applying self-explanation strategies
Learners can evaluate visual salience of learning materials based on eye-tracking data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
